at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.objects

Class Blocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.objects.GameObject
      • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.objects.Enemy
        • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.objects.Blocker

  • public class Blocker
extends Enemy
    Blocker enemy, that cannot be touched from front can be configured to walk back and forth on platform or stand still
    Author:
    simon
